ntp_show_less.title: Weniger anzeigen
ntp_show_less.note: Button that reduces the number of items or content displayed.

ntp_show_more.title: Mehr anzeigen
ntp_show_more.note: Button that increases the number of items or content displayed.

ntp_dismiss.title: Verwerfen
ntp_dismiss.note: Button that closes or hides the current popup or notification.

ntp_customizer_button.title: Anpassen
ntp_customizer_button.note: Button opens a menu. The menu allows the user to customize the page, such as showing/hiding sections.

widgets_visibility_menu_title.title: Neuen Tab anpassen
widgets_visibility_menu_title.note: Heading text describing that there's a list of toggles for customizing the page layout.

updateNotification_updated_version.title: Browser auf Version {version} aktualisiert.
updateNotification_updated_version.note: Text to indicate which new version was updated. `{version}` will be formatted like `1.22.0`

updateNotification_whats_new.title: Sieh dir an, was es in dieser Version Neues gibt.
updateNotification_whats_new.note: The `<a>` tag represents a clickable link, please preserve it.

updateNotification_dismiss_btn.title: Verwerfen
updateNotification_dismiss_btn.note: Button label text for an action that removes the widget from the screen.

stats_menuTitle.title: Blockierte Tracking-Versuche
stats_menuTitle.note: Used as a label in a customization menu

stats_noActivity.title: Blockierte Tracking-Versuche werden hier angezeigt. Browse weiter, um zu sehen, wie viele wir blockieren.
stats_noActivity.note: Placeholder for when we cannot report any blocked trackers yet

stats_noRecent.title: Keine aktuellen Tracking-Aktivitäten
stats_noRecent.note: Placeholder to indicate that no tracking activity was blocked in the last 7 days

stats_countBlockedSingular.title: 1 Tracking-Versuch blockiert
stats_countBlockedSingular.note: The main headline indicating that a single tracker was blocked

stats_countBlockedPlural.title: {count} Tracking-Versuche blockiert
stats_countBlockedPlural.note: The main headline indicating that more than 1 attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 tracking attempts blocked'

stats_feedCountBlockedSingular.title: 1 Versuch von DuckDuckGo in den letzten 7 Tagen blockiert
stats_feedCountBlockedSingular.note: A summary description of how many tracking attempts where blocked, when only one exists.

stats_feedCountBlockedPeriod.title: Vergangene 7 Tage
stats_feedCountBlockedPeriod.note: A summary description indicating the time period of the blocked tracking attempts, which is the past 7 days.

stats_feedCountBlockedPlural.title: {count} Tracking-Versuche blockiert
stats_feedCountBlockedPlural.note: A summary description of how many tracking attempts were blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 7 days when there is more than one. E.g., '1,028 tracking attempts blocked.

stats_toggleLabel.title: Aktuelle Aktivität anzeigen
stats_toggleLabel.note: The aria-label text for a toggle button that shows the detailed activity feed

stats_hideLabel.title: Letzte Aktivitäten ausblenden
stats_hideLabel.note: The aria-label text for a toggle button that hides the detailed activity feed

stats_otherCompanyName.title: Anderes
stats_otherCompanyName.note: A placeholder to represent an aggregated count of entries, not present in the rest of the list. For example, 'Other: 200', which would mean 200 entries excluding the ones already shown

stats_otherCount.title: {count} Versuche von anderen Netzwerken
stats_otherCount.note: An aggregated count of blocked entries not present in the main list. For example, '200 attempts from other networks'

nextSteps_sectionTitle.title: Nächste Schritte
nextSteps_sectionTitle.note: Text that goes in the Next Steps bubble above the first card

nextSteps_bringStuff_title.title: Bring deine Sachen
nextSteps_bringStuff_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for importing bookmarks and favorites

nextSteps_bringStuff_summary.title: Importiere Lesezeichen, Favoriten und Passwörter für einen reibungslosen Übergang von deinem alten Browser.
nextSteps_bringStuff_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for importing bookmarks and favorites

nextSteps_bringStuff_actionText.title: Jetzt importieren
nextSteps_bringStuff_actionText.note: Button text of the Next Steps card for importing bookmarks and favorites

nextSteps_defaultApp_title.title: Als Standard-Browser festlegen
nextSteps_defaultApp_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for making DDG the user's default browser

nextSteps_defaultApp_summary.title: Wir blockieren automatisch Tracker, während du browst. Das ist Datenschutz, vereinfacht.
nextSteps_defaultApp_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for making DDG the user's default browser

nextSteps_defaultApp_actionText.title: Standardbrowser erstellen
nextSteps_defaultApp_actionText.note: Button text of the Next Steps card for making DDG the user's default browser

nextSteps_blockCookies_title.title: Cookie-Pop-ups blockieren
nextSteps_blockCookies_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for blocking cookie pop-ups

nextSteps_blockCookies_summary.title: Wir brauchen deine Erlaubnis, um in deinem Namen Cookies abzulehnen. Leichte Entscheidung.
nextSteps_blockCookies_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for blocking cookie pop-ups

nextSteps_blockCookies_actionText.title: Cookie-Pop-ups blockieren
nextSteps_blockCookies_actionText.note: Button text of the Next Steps card for blocking cookie pop-ups

nextSteps_emailProtection_title.title: Schütze deinen Posteingang
nextSteps_emailProtection_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for email protection

nextSteps_emailProtection_summary.title: Erstelle @duck.com-Adressen, die Tracker aus E-Mails entfernen und an deinen Posteingang weiterleiten.
nextSteps_emailProtection_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for email protection

nextSteps_emailProtection_actionText.title: Email-Schutz erhalten
nextSteps_emailProtection_actionText.note: Button text of the Next Steps card for email protection

nextSteps_duckPlayer_title.title: YouTube ohne aufdringliche Werbung
nextSteps_duckPlayer_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for adopting DuckPlayer

nextSteps_duckPlayer_summary.title: Genieße ein sauberes Seherlebnis ohne personalisierte Werbung.
nextSteps_duckPlayer_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for adopting DuckPlayer

nextSteps_duckPlayer_actionText.title: Duck Player testen
nextSteps_duckPlayer_actionText.note: Button text of the Next Steps card for adopting DuckPlayer

nextSteps_addAppDockMac_title.title: App zum Dock hinzufügen
nextSteps_addAppDockMac_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_addAppDockMac_summary.title: Greife schneller auf DuckDuckGo zu, indem du es zum Dock hinzufügst.
nextSteps_addAppDockMac_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_addAppDockMac_actionText.title: Zum Dock hinzufügen
nextSteps_addAppDockMac_actionText.note: Initial button text of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_addAppDockMac_confirmationText.title: Zum Dock hinzugefügt!
nextSteps_addAppDockMac_confirmationText.note: Button text after clicking on the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_title.title: App an die Taskleiste anheften
nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_summary.title: Greife schneller auf DuckDuckGo zu, indem du es an die Taskleiste heftest.
nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_actionT.title: An Taskleiste pinnen
nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_actionT.note: Initial button text of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_confirm.title: An die Taskleiste angeheftet!
nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_confirm.note: Button text after clicking on the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

favorites_show_less.title: Weniger anzeigen
favorites_show_less.note: Button label to display fewer items

favorites_show_more.title: Mehr anzeigen ({count} verbleibend)
favorites_show_more.note: Button text to show hidden items. {count} will be replaced with the number of remaining favorite items to show, including the parentheses. Example: 'Show more (18 remaining)'

favorites_menu_title.title: Favoriten
favorites_menu_title.note: Used as a label in a customization menu

favorites_add.title: Favorit hinzufügen
favorites_add.note: A button that allows a user to add a new 'favorite' bookmark to their existing list
